title: NO FEE.  Sunny and Attractive.  Move-In Ready
posting_body: SUNNY, NEWLY RENOVATED, OUTDOOR PATIO SPACE, LAUNDRY, LOCATION.
You'll be glad to make this Saint Marks 4 bedroom unit in an extremely well-maintained building YOUR HOME.
Out back, you have a bit of outdoor space, perfect for summer grilling.
The bedrooms are large with good closet space.
All new insulation means year-round savings on heating and cooling.
Washers/Dryers, NOT COIN OP, in basement.
Located on one-way street between Adams and Dorchester.
A short walk to Ashmont MBTA Station (with quick access to red line, trolley and bus connections), local restaurants, and shopping, this home's location is ideal!
